alMufid.title: Al-Mufid Series
alMufid.description: Your practical companion for mastering Arabic. A series focusing on the functional use of language in daily life and study.
alMufid.usageDesc: We move away from theory and focus on how to use the language directly.
alMufid.referenceDesc: Summaries and tables that make accessing information easy in seconds.
alMufid.vocabDesc: Terms that keep pace with the era, technology, and media.
alMufid.mufidVol1Desc: Selected texts to develop rapid comprehension skills.
alMufid.mufidVol2Desc: Rules of spelling, punctuation, and functional expression arts.
alMufid.mufidVol3Desc: Dialogues and scenarios to develop verbal fluency.

alWafi.title: Al-Wafi Series

alWafi.audioDesc: Listening texts recorded by elite broadcasters.
alWafi.exercisesDesc: Thousands of questions and exercises to consolidate information.
alWafi.wafiVol1Desc: Introduction to nominal and verbal sentences and basic vocabulary.
alWafi.wafiVol2Desc: In-depth study of annullers, objects, and appositives.
alWafi.wafiVol3Desc: Understanding Arabic word structure, the morphological scale, and derivatives.
alWafi.wafiVol4Desc: Study of the arts of eloquence, embellishment, and meanings in literary texts.

gardenOfArabic.title: The Arabic Language Garden
gardenOfArabic.description: A comprehensive educational series taking students on a growth journey, from planting letters to harvesting eloquence.
gardenOfArabic.stagesDesc: A gradual methodology ensuring a solid foundation and natural skill development.
gardenOfArabic.exercisesDesc: A collection of exercises and activities to reinforce learning.
gardenOfArabic.level1Desc: Establishing proper pronunciation of Arabic letters and writing their different forms.
gardenOfArabic.level2Desc: Enriching linguistic repertoire with words from daily surroundings with illustrations.
gardenOfArabic.level3Desc: Moving from word to useful sentence, understanding basic grammar simply.
gardenOfArabic.level4Desc: Reading short texts and stories and developing written and oral expression skills.
gardenOfArabic.feature1: Talking interactive stories that capture a child's attention.

hidayah.title: Hidayah Curriculum
hidayah.description: An integrated Islamic educational series aiming to build balanced character and plant noble values in youth.
hidayah.aqidahDesc: Planting faith in Allah and knowing the pillars of Islam in a way that speaks to the mind and heart.
hidayah.fiqhDesc: Simplified practical teaching of prayer and daily worship and their connection to life.
hidayah.akhlaqDesc: Promoting moral values like honesty, integrity, and kindness to parents.
hidayah.journeyDesc: The curriculum is divided into gradual stages suitable for mental and spiritual growth.
hidayah.level1Desc: Foundation stage: Simplified stories, chants, and basic principles.
hidayah.level2Desc: Building stage: Understanding the meanings of worship and memorizing short Surahs.
hidayah.level3Desc: Understanding stage: Studying the Seerah of the Prophet ﷺ and applying ethics in society.
hidayah.level4Desc: Application stage: Awareness of contemporary issues and building leadership character.

hidayahFr.title: Hidayah Curriculum (French)
hidayahFr.description: An integrated Islamic curriculum for French speakers, linking authentic Islamic values to the child's European reality.
hidayahFr.bilingualDesc: Explaining Islamic concepts in French with a sophisticated style.
hidayahFr.contextDesc: Addressing identity and integration issues facing children in the West.
hidayahFr.sourceDesc: Moderation and balance derived from the Quran and Sunnah.
hidayahFr.journeyDesc: Four stages to build a balanced and positive Muslim personality.
hidayahFr.level1Desc: Planting the love of Allah and the Prophet through illustrated stories.
hidayahFr.level2Desc: Understanding the pillars of Islam and Faith in a simplified way.
hidayahFr.level3Desc: Applying Islamic ethics in school and society.
hidayahFr.level4Desc: Pride in Islamic identity with positive openness.

hidayahEn.title: Hidayah Curriculum (English)
hidayahEn.description: An integrated Islamic curriculum for English speakers. Connecting authentic values with daily life in the West.
hidayahEn.westernDesc: Addressing identity challenges in the West.

qawaedMobasta.title: Simplified Grammar
qawaedMobasta.description: Goodbye to grammar complexities. We present Arabic grammar in a smart visual style and mind maps that make understanding intuitive.
qawaedMobasta.visualDesc: Transforming rigid texts into clear diagrams.
qawaedMobasta.colorDesc: Using colors to distinguish word functions in a sentence.
qawaedMobasta.mapsDesc: Connecting rules together in one comprehensive board.
qawaedMobasta.coreDesc: Everything you need to build a sound sentence.
qawaedMobasta.sentenceDesc: How to arrange words to form a correct nominal or verbal sentence.
qawaedMobasta.tensesDesc: Past, present, and imperative, and how to conjugate them easily.
qawaedMobasta.pronounsDesc: A comprehensive map of attached and detached pronouns.
qawaedMobasta.particlesDesc: The role of particles (prepositions, conjunctions) in changing meaning.
qawaedMobasta.tryDesc: We turn complex rules into simple equations you can remember and apply immediately.

tareeqAlMuneerAr.description: A specialized methodology for teaching Arabic reading and writing, leading the student from illiteracy to fluency.

tareeqAlMuneerAr.visualDesc: Design that considers visual comfort and letter differentiation.
tareeqAlMuneerAr.gradualDesc: Smooth transition from letter to word to sentence.
tareeqAlMuneerAr.milestonesDesc: Four essential milestones ensuring a solid foundation.

tareeqAlMuneerAr.level3Desc: Skills of connecting letters and building words.
tareeqAlMuneerAr.level4Desc: Reading sentences and simple texts with speed and understanding.

tareeqAlMuneerFr.culturalDesc: Texts considering the cultural background of the Western student.
tareeqAlMuneerFr.pathDesc: Four levels taking the student from alphabet to fluency.

theHappyMuslim.title: The Happy Muslim

theHappyMuslim.modernityDesc: Interactive and fun methods that speak the language of today's children.
theHappyMuslim.valuesDesc: Instilling ethics and manners through engaging stories and activities.
theHappyMuslim.booksDesc: A graduated series designed for every stage of your child's spiritual growth.

theHappyMuslim.creativeDesc: Artistic activities and chants that develop taste and aesthetic sense.

theHappyMuslim.book2Desc: Teaching manners of eating, sleeping, and dealing with others.
theHappyMuslim.book3Desc: Selected stories from the life of the Prophet ﷺ highlighting his mercy.
theHappyMuslim.book4Desc: Reflecting on Allah's creations and protecting the environment.
theHappyMuslim.book5Desc: Actions of the heart like honesty, love, and trust in Allah.
